messages.terrainborder: There is water! Order a ship!
Land in sight! You have to go anchor and land!

treasure.name: Moscow
treasure.message: %1 discovered a small village called Moscow! The natives offered :him: a drink that was crystal clear like water. За твоë здоровье!

treasure.name: Cracow
treasure.message: %1 traverses the beer/vodka border... Na zdrowie!

treasure.name: Munich
treasure.message: %1 tasted a marvalous drink in Munich. The natives there call it "Freibier". And the best of it: it was for free! Prost!

treasure.name: Turku
treasure.message: %1 tasted some Salmiakki vodka in Turku. It was horrible! - Kippis!

treasure.name: Uppsala
treasure.message: Uppsala! %1 discovered natives that offered :him: an absolut drink - Skål!

treasure.name: London
treasure.message: %1 whished to have brought some coke along 'cause the whiskey in London was a bit too strong - Cheers!

treasure.name: Cork
treasure.message: %1 entered a pub in an old village. The cider was fine but a bit too sweet - Slàinte!

treasure.name: The Gauls
treasure.message: %1 met some crazy Gauls! But they didn't let :him: taste their magic drink :(

treasure.name: Lyon
treasure.message: %1 tasted some Nouveau Beaujolais - it was not the best wine, but it was cheap! Santé!

treasure.name: Tallinn
treasure.message: %1 got some Saku Lager in an Estonian pub - not bad, :he: thought. Terviseks!

treasure.name: Reykjavik
treasure.message: %1 first thought that the geysers in Iceland were hot. But then, :he: tasted Brennivín, a liquor also called Black Death... Skál!

treasure.name: Trondheim
treasure.message: %1 never thought that potatoes and caraway seeds could knock a person under the table. Akevitt or the Water of Life did so - Skål!

treasure.name: Oulu
treasure.message: After a really warming (or better: burning) sauna in Oulu, %1 tasted some Terva Snapsi - it tasted like tarry wood!

treasure.name: Athens
treasure.message: %1 had some good Ouzo in Athens - Στη γεια σου!

treasure.name: Naples
treasure.message: %1 don't know what :he: liked more in Naples: the Chianti or the Italian temper - Salute!

treasure.name: Palma de Mallorca
treasure.message: %1 felt a bit like in Munich - but the Spanish beer and the warm Mediterranean convinced :him: well that he was not in Germany. Pros..., ehm, Salud!

treasure.name: Istanbul
treasure.message: %1 had a turkish coffee. Now :he: felt like that :he: could explore the whole near and far orient without sleeping!

treasure.name: Sevilla
treasure.message: %1 couldn't hardly leave Sevilla: all those Spanish festivals and the Spanish Cherry... Salud!

treasure.name: Gizeh
treasure.message: %1 wondered if anyone has ever thought about transplanting a nose - the Sphinx would look far better if it had one.

treasure.name: Algiers
treasure.message: It was really hot in Algiers! Luckily some friendly inhabitants offered :him: a refreshing, golden-coloured mint tea. Fisehatak!
